subtitle.track1: Yang Fan, do you have brothers or sisters?
subtitle.track3: Yáng Fān, nǐ yǒu xiōngdìjiěmèi ma?

subtitle.track1: I am an only child
Do you have uncles or aunts?
I do, My father has two older brothers
subtitle.track2: 有, 我爸爸有两个哥哥
subtitle.track3: Yǒu, wǒ bàba yǒu liǎng ge gēge

subtitle.track1: My mother has a younger sister
subtitle.track3: wǒ māma yǒu yī ge mèimei

subtitle.track1: Do you all live together?
subtitle.track3: Nǐmen dōu zhù zài yīqǐ ma?

subtitle.track1: No, my parents and my paternal grandparents live in Hangzhou
subtitle.track2: 没有, 我爸爸妈妈和我爷爷奶奶住在杭州
subtitle.track3: méiyǒu, wǒ bàbamāma hé wǒ yéye nǎinai zhù zài Hángzhōu

subtitle.track1: My uncles and aunt live in Nanjing
subtitle.track2: 我的叔叔阿姨住在南京
subtitle.track3: wǒ de shūshu āyí zhù zài Nánjīng

subtitle.track1: What year were you born in?
I was born in the year of the dragon. And you, Amanda?
subtitle.track2: 我属龙。Amanda，你呢. Amanda, nǐ ne?

subtitle.track1: How many people are in your familiy?
My family has four members
subtitle.track3: Wǒ jiā yǒu sì kǒu rén

subtitle.track1: that is my parents, my younger brother, my two older sisters and me
subtitle.track2: 就我的爸爸妈妈,弟弟,两个姐姐还有我
subtitle.track3: jiù wǒde bàbamǎma, dìdi, liǎng ge jiějie háiyǒu wǒ

subtitle.track1: How old is your brother this year?
subtitle.track3: Nǐ dìdi jīnnián duō dà le?

subtitle.track1: He is nineteen this year, he is still at university
subtitle.track2: 他今年十九，他还在读大学
subtitle.track3: Tā jīnnián shí jiǔ, tā háizài dú dàxué

subtitle.track1: What is his subject?
He is studying architecture
Later he wants to work as a designer
subtitle.track3: tā yǐhòu xiǎng dāng ge shèjìshī.

subtitle.track1: What do your parents do?
subtitle.track3: Nǐ de fùmǔ háizài gōngzuò ma?

subtitle.track1: My father still works
He works in a trading company
What about your mother?
My mother is already retired
Before, she was a chemistry teacher
Where do you now work?
I work in London for a computer company
subtitle.track2: 我在伦敦的一家电脑公司上班
subtitle.track3: Wǒ zài Lúndūn de yī jiā diànnǎo gōngsī shàngbān

subtitle.track1: I am a software engineer
